item.title: Heavy snow and rainfall kill 61, injure 110 over 3 days in Afghanistan - NPR

item.title: Trump says UK soldiers in Afghanistan 'among greatest of all warriors'
item.description: The US president’s praise follows his claim that allied forces avoided the front lines during the Afghanistan conflict.

item.title: Italy’s Meloni rebukes Trump remarks on NATO’s role in Afghanistan
item.description: Italian PM Giorgia Meloni calls Trump's NATO comments about Afghanistan "unacceptable," defending Italy's sacrifice of 53 soldiers killed in the conflict.
